ticket.title: Task rails:freeze:gems not working with gem 1.5.x
ticket.original-body:
I discovered this problem in 2.3.11 as
Freezing to the gems for Rails 2.3.11 rm -rf vendor/rails mkdir -p vendor/rails cd vendor/rails rm -rf vendor/rails rake aborted! undefined method `version_requirements' for #<Gem::Dependency:0x0000000187c7c8>
Someone at open SuSE also ran into this and even developed a patch http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-ruby/2011-02/msg00001.html
